procedures.name: Informed consent
procedures.label: Informed consent process
procedures.description: Process of obtaining written informed consent from the participant prior to any study-specific procedures

code.decode: Other specified counseling

procedures.name: Medical history and demographics
procedures.label: Medical history/demographics
procedures.description: Collection of participant medical history, Wilson disease history, prior WD treatment, and demographic data

code.decode: Office or other outpatient visit, new patient, problem focused

procedures.name: Physical examination
procedures.label: Full physical examination
procedures.description: Complete physical examination including cardiovascular, respiratory, gastrointestinal, and neurological systems, with symptom-driven exams as needed

code.decode: Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management

procedures.name: Height and weight measurement
procedures.label: Height, weight, and BMI
procedures.description: Measurement of body height, body weight and calculation of body mass index

code.decode: Body mass index documented

procedures.name: Vital signs measurement
procedures.label: Vital signs
procedures.description: Measurement of body temperature, heart rate, respiratory rate, and systolic and diastolic blood pressure using automated device when available

code.decode: Self-measured blood pressure using a device validated for clinical accuracy; patient education/training

procedures.name: 12-lead electrocardiogram
procedures.label: Triplicate 12-lead ECG
procedures.description: Triplicate 12-lead ECGs including heart rate and PR, QRS, QT, and QTc intervals; collected at specified time points including 4 hours postdose on certain days

code.decode: Electrocardiogram, routine ECG with at least 12 leads; tracing only

procedures.name: Blood draw for pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics
procedures.label: Blood sampling for PK/PD
procedures.description: Venous blood sampling for measurement of plasma total molybdenum, plasma ultrafiltrate molybdenum, plasma total and ultrafiltrate copper, labile bound copper, ceruloplasmin, and ceruloplasmin-bound copper at specified time points

code.decode: Collection of venous blood by venipuncture

procedures.name: Retained serum sample collection
procedures.label: Retained serum sample (safety)
procedures.description: Collection of a single 15 mL serum sample for potential future analysis in the event of unexpected safety findings

code.decode: Collection of venous blood by venipuncture

procedures.name: Clinical chemistry testing
procedures.label: Serum chemistry
procedures.description: Laboratory serum chemistry testing following at least 8 hours fasting at screening and check-in, and at specified on-treatment time points

code.decode: Comprehensive metabolic panel

procedures.name: Hematology testing
procedures.label: Hematology
procedures.description: Complete blood count testing including monitoring for anemia and leukopenia

code.decode: Complete blood count (CBC) with automated differential

procedures.name: Coagulation testing
procedures.label: Coagulation tests
procedures.description: Laboratory assessment of coagulation parameters at specified time points

code.decode: Thromboplastin time, partial (PTT); plasma

procedures.name: Urinalysis
procedures.label: Urinalysis
procedures.description: Routine urinalysis performed at screening and during the study

code.decode: Urinalysis, automated, with microscopy

procedures.name: Serum pregnancy test
procedures.label: Serum pregnancy test
procedures.description: Serum pregnancy testing for women of childbearing potential at screening and as required by site policies

code.decode: Chorionic gonadotropin test, quantitative

procedures.name: Urine pregnancy test
procedures.label: Urine pregnancy test
procedures.description: Urine pregnancy testing at protocol-specified visits and at least every 4 weeks during the study for women of childbearing potential

code.decode: Urine pregnancy test, by visual color comparison methods

procedures.name: Follicle-stimulating hormone test
procedures.label: FSH test (post-menopausal females)
procedures.description: Measurement of follicle-stimulating hormone in post-menopausal females when needed to confirm menopause

code.decode: Gonadotropin, follicle stimulating hormone (FSH); serum

procedures.name: Alcohol test
procedures.label: Alcohol test
procedures.description: Testing for alcohol use at screening and check-in

code.decode: Alcohol (ethanol); any specimen except breath

procedures.name: Urine drug screen
procedures.label: Urine drug screen
procedures.description: Urine testing for drugs of abuse at screening and check-in

code.decode: Drug test(s), presumptive, any number of drug classes

procedures.name: HIV, hepatitis B and C screening
procedures.label: Viral infection screening
procedures.description: Laboratory screening tests for HIV, hepatitis B, and hepatitis C infection

code.decode: Acute hepatitis panel

procedures.name: Copper and molybdenum mass balance assessment
procedures.label: Copper and molybdenum balance measurements
procedures.description: Assessment of net copper and molybdenum balance based on intake and output, using ICP-MS analysis of all intake and excreta

code.decode: Copper; serum

procedures.name: Food and fluid sampling
procedures.label: Food and fluid collection for Cu/Mo concentrations
procedures.description: Collection of samples from all meal and fluid batches, including water from a common dispenser, for copper and molybdenum concentration analysis by ICP-MS

code.decode: Handling and/or conveyance of specimen for transfer

procedures.name: 24-hour urine collection
procedures.label: 24-hour urine for copper and molybdenum
procedures.description: Collection of 24-hour pooled urine samples for measurement of copper and molybdenum content and volume recording

code.decode: Urinalysis, 24-hour collection

procedures.name: Fecal sample collection
procedures.label: Feces for copper and molybdenum
procedures.description: Individual collection, weighing, and time-stamping of each stool sample for copper and molybdenum concentration analysis by ICP-MS

code.decode: Specialty fecal analysis, not otherwise specified

procedures.name: Urination and bowel movement monitoring
procedures.label: Bowel and urine monitoring
procedures.description: Monitoring and recording of urination and bowel movements, including weight and time of bowel movements and menstruation checks for women

code.decode: Remote physiologic monitoring treatment management services, 20 minutes or more

procedures.name: Intake monitoring
procedures.label: Food and fluid intake monitoring
procedures.description: Monitoring of intake of investigational agent, food, and fluids as part of balance assessments

code.decode: Medical nutrition therapy; initial assessment and intervention

procedures.name: Copper- and molybdenum-controlled diet administration
procedures.label: Cu/Mo-controlled meals
procedures.description: Provision and supervision of copper- and molybdenum-controlled diet during inpatient periods, with encouragement to complete all meals

code.decode: Medical nutrition therapy; re-assessment and intervention

procedures.name: Light exercise program
procedures.label: Light exercise regimen
procedures.description: Implementation of a light exercise regimen during specified days as part of metabolic monitoring

code.decode: Therapeutic exercises

procedures.name: Adverse event assessment
procedures.label: Adverse events monitoring
procedures.description: Ongoing assessment and documentation of treatment-emergent adverse events and serious adverse events throughout the study

code.decode: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient

procedures.name: Suicidal ideation and behavior risk monitoring
procedures.label: Suicidality monitoring
procedures.description: Monitoring participants for suicidal ideation and behavior risk at specified intervals

code.decode: Brief emotional/behavioral assessment

procedures.name: Contraception counseling
procedures.label: Discuss/document contraception
procedures.description: Discussion and documentation of contraceptive use and requirements with study participants

code.decode: Preventive medicine counseling and/or risk factor reduction intervention

procedures.name: Outpatient visit or phone follow-up
procedures.label: Outpatient visit or phone call
procedures.description: Outpatient clinic visit or telephone contact for safety laboratory assessment and follow-up

code.decode: Telephone evaluation and management service

procedures.name: Hospital admission to clinical research unit
procedures.label: Admit to unit
procedures.description: Admission of participant to the clinical research unit for inpatient study periods and intensive metabolic monitoring

code.decode: Initial hospital care, per day, for the evaluation and management of a patient

procedures.name: Hospital discharge from clinical research unit
procedures.label: Discharge from unit
procedures.description: Discharge of participant from the clinical research unit after completion of all required procedures and safety assessment review

code.decode: Hospital discharge day management; 30 minutes or less

procedures.name: Wilson disease history assessment
procedures.label: WD history
procedures.description: Collection of Wilson disease history including diagnosis date, method of diagnosis, history of cirrhosis, prior liver biopsies, and treatments received

code.decode: Prolonged office or other outpatient evaluation and management service

procedures.name: Concomitant medication and therapy review
procedures.label: Concomitant medication and therapy review
procedures.description: Recording and evaluation of all concomitant medications and non-pharmacologic therapies or procedures

code.decode: Eligible clinician attests to documenting in the medical record they obtained, updated, or reviewed the patientâ€™s current medications

procedures.name: Copper and molybdenum measurement by ICP-MS
procedures.label: ICP-MS analysis
procedures.description: Laboratory determination of copper and molybdenum concentration in intake and excreta samples using inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry

code.decode: Chemistry procedure, trace elements, not otherwise specified

procedures.name: Neurological assessment
procedures.label: Neurologic examination
procedures.description: Neurological component of the physical examination and monitoring for neurologic adverse events, including potential worsening due to decoppering

code.decode: Canalith repositioning procedure(s) (e.g., Epley maneuver)

medicalDevices.name: Automated blood pressure monitor
medicalDevices.label: Automated vital signs monitor
medicalDevices.description: Completely automated device used to measure blood pressure and heart rate for vital sign assessments

medicalDevices.name: 12-lead electrocardiograph
medicalDevices.label: 12-lead ECG device
medicalDevices.description: Device used to record triplicate 12-lead electrocardiograms for assessment of cardiac intervals and rhythm

medicalDevices.name: Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometer
medicalDevices.label: ICP-MS
medicalDevices.description: Laboratory diagnostic device used to determine copper and molybdenum concentrations in biological and dietary samples

medicalDevices.name: Venous access cannula
medicalDevices.label: Peripheral intravenous cannula
medicalDevices.description: Cannula placed for repeated blood draws to minimize needle sticks, not left in place longer than 72 hours and flushed at least every 8 hours

medicalDevices.name: Automated hematology analyzer
medicalDevices.label: CBC analyzer
medicalDevices.description: Laboratory analyzer used for complete blood count measurements

medicalDevices.name: Clinical chemistry analyzer
medicalDevices.label: Serum chemistry analyzer
medicalDevices.description: Laboratory analyzer used to perform serum chemistry testing including liver function tests

ingredients.name: Molybdenum (as component of tetrathiomolybdate complex in ALXN1840)
